product_name: BugBand Bed Bugs No More Pesticide - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Get a good night's sleep in hotels and hostels with BugBand Bed Bugs No More pesticide. Geraniol spray formula works by attacking the bed bug's exoskeleton; kills eggs, larvae, nymphs and adult bed bugs on contact. Nontoxic, water-based formula is safe for bedding, children and pets. 3 fl. oz. bottle is approved by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) for carry-on baggage.
short_description: Get a good night's sleep in hotels and hostels with BugBand Bed Bugs No More pesticide.
